effect.diamond-pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user strikes at the foe with a hard bone two to five times in a row.
flavor_text.platinum: The user strikes at the foe with a hard bone two to five times in a row.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user strikes at the foe with a hard bone two to five times in a row.
